import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,compose,createStore}from"redux";import profileReducer from"./profile-reducer";import CarReducer from"./car-reducer";import DataReducer from"./data-reduser";import usersReducer from"./users-reducer";import authReducer from"./auth-reducer";import thunkMiddleware from"redux-thunk";import{reducer as formReducer}from'redux-form';import appReducer from"./app-reducer";var reducers=combineReducers({profilePage:profileReducer,profileCar:CarReducer,profileData:DataReducer,usersPage:usersReducer,auth:authReducer,form:formReducer,app:appReducer});//подключили расширение
var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducers,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware)));export default store;
